outputs.output_descr: PPG will cover the following activities:1) review and analysis of the public transport services in Almaty;2) review and analysis of traffic management in the city;3) review of fuel standards and exisiting monitoring practicies of CO2 and other local pollutants;4)scoping of bus/trollyebus transit demo project

project_descr: Sustainable Transport in the city of Almaty__preparatory phase
